akn:content.akn:p:
§ 854. Rules, regulations, and forms The Attorney General may at any time, make, prescribe, amend, and rescind such rules, regulations and forms as he deems necessary to carry out the provisions of this subchapter. (Aug. 1, 1956, ch. 849, § 5, 70 Stat. 900.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was not enacted as part of the Internal Security Act of 1950 which comprises subchapters I to III of this chapter.
